hints.content:
The first bar lines up to $\redD{55}$.   


[[☃ image 1]]

Which fruit had $\redD{55}$ votes?

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Fruit and the vertical axis labeled Number of votes. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: question mark, question mark, question mark, question mark, and question mark. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70 and 80. The bar line for each Fruit shows the following: first question mark bar line extends to the middle of 50 and 60, second question mark bar line extends to the middle of 20 and 30, third question mark bar line extends to the middle of 30 and 40, fourth question mark bar line extends to 10, and fifth question mark bar line extends to 50.  A red line is drawn to the right from the middle of 50 and 60, which reaches to the end of the first question mark bar line. !

hints.content:
Fruit  | Number of votes  
:- | :-: 
Apple | $\redD{55}$ 

Apple had $\redD{55}$ votes.  So, the first bar should be labeled $\redD{\text{Apple}}$.

Now let's label the other bars.


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Fruit and the vertical axis labeled Number of votes. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Apple, Mango, Grapes, Kiwi, and Banana. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70 and 80. The bar line for each Fruit shows the following: Apple bar line extends to the middle of 50 and 60, Mango bar line extends to the middle of 20 and 30, Grapes bar line extends to the middle of 30 and 40, Kiwi bar line extends to 10, and Banana bar line extends to 50. !

question.content:
To prepare her grocery list, Ivy asked everyone coming to the family reunion what their favorite fruit is. She created a chart and a bar graph with the results.

Fruit  | Number of votes  
:- | :-: 
Banana | $50$ 
Apple | $55$ 
Kiwi | $10$ 
Grapes | $35$ 
Mango | $25$ 

**Label each bar on the bar graph.**

[[☃ label-image 1]]

options.imageAlt: A table shows fruit and the number of votes. Bananas had fifty votes. Apples had fifty five votes. Kiwi had ten votes. Grapes had thirty five votes and mangos had twenty five votes.
